faq_how_it_works_title: How does the Carting service work?
faq_how_it_works_desc: After placing an order, the nearest driver will pick up and deliver your cargo to the specified address.
faq_payment_methods_desc: Our service accepts payments in cash, by bank cards, and through payment systems.
faq_pricing_desc: The cost depends on the distance, weight, and volume of the cargo. The final amount will be displayed at the time of order placement.
faq_referral_title: How much reward can a user get for inviting others?
faq_referral_desc: If you send your referral link, and a new user registers through it and pays for a service in the app, you will receive 0.15% of the service cost as a reward.
faq_login_title: What do you need to log in to the app?
faq_login_desc: Logging into the Carting app is very easy. Simply enter your phone number or email address. A login code will be sent via SMS or email.
about_us_desc: Carting is a modern platform for convenient, fast, and reliable management of freight transportation and logistics services. We ensure secure delivery, easy order processing, and quick onboarding of verified service providers.
about_us_why_points: ✅ Convenient and fast order processing – just a few steps in the app. ✅ Verified professionals – reliable specialists ensure safe delivery. ✅ Transparent pricing – no hidden fees, only fair prices. ✅ 24/7 support – always available to assist you.
about_us_slogan: Wherever you go – your cargo is in safe hands!

title.description:
Carting refers to all types of transport services 
 an innovative platform concentrated in one place.

about.description:
Carting-Every with you 
            In step now together!
about.description2: We offer the most popular transport and logistics services to the population and corporate customers quickly, easily and reliably, on the basis of modern technologies. Our goal is to provide opportunities for large and small companies, individual entrepreneurs and individuals to enjoy quality, affordable and safe transportation services at any time, from anywhere, through this platform.
